name: Alchemist's Awakening
description: Alchemist's Awakening combines an open-world fantasy experience with a multiplayer survival/creative gameplay. Use elements as attacks, recombine them into building blocks, and give life to any shape you built: then watch your truly unique creatures stand for you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2 compatible card with 1 GB of memory, nVidia速 4XX+/AMD速 5XXX+ Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3 compatible card with 2 GB of memory, nVidia速 7XX+/AMD速 7XXX+ Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
